title: Banner of martyr Mostafa Samir Al-Sawy
description: Phototgraphers' description: photos and video of Jan 29-Feb 11, 2011, Protests (downtown) & celebration in Maadi. Text in image: لن ننساك... الشهيد البطل مصطفى سمير الصاوى شهيد الحرية...صديق القرأن. Translation of Text in image: Friend of freedom ... the Qur'an will not forget ... The hero martyr Mostafa Samir Al-Sawy.
name: Al-Sawy, Mostafa Samir
subject-lcsh: Demonstrations; Egypt; Protest movements; Revolutions; Victims of state-sponsored terrorism
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
